name: Junkyard: Crash it & Cash it
description:
Howdy folks!

We believe in your management skills, so from now on you will have a unique opportuninty to administer the Junkyard!

There’s plenty of old, rusty cars and trucks waiting to be left in our fab yard. Drive in with as many vehicles as possible and remove any obstacles that stand in your way.

Time is money, and cars are too, so you need to respond fast. Customers are getting annoyed while waiting for too long! Sadly, you must also be nice to them to get tips just to pay the damned taxes!

Our pal Joe will guide you. And remember: do not run out of space!!
